meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a public demonstration or protest.
meanings.sent1: The manifestants gathered peacefully to express their opinions.
meanings.sent2: The city streets were filled with manifestants advocating for change.
meanings.sent3: The manifestants wore colorful hats to stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of manifestants, one voice rose above the rest.
meanings.sent5: The image of the manifestants chanting will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in a public demonstration or protest.
meanings.sent1: Participation of manifestants in the rally was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The manifestants' manifestation made a strong impact on society.
meanings.sent3: The manifestants' protest signs were creative and eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: The power of the manifestants' unity was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The energy of the manifestants' demonstration was palpable in the air.
